CustomField.description: The Groth Amount for this account and all OPC related child accounts for the year to date
CustomField.formula: Apr_Group_Growth__c + Aug_Group_Growth__c + Dec_Group_Growth__c + Feb_Group_Growth__c + Jan_Group_Growth__c + Jul_Group_Growth__c + Jun_Group_Growth__c + Mar_Group_Growth__c + May_Group_Growth__c + Nov_Group_Growth__c + Oct_Group_Growth__c + Sep_Group_Growth__c
CustomField.label: Total Group Growth YTD +/-
